title: Chain Of Fools (2000-Elijah Wood,Steve Zahn, Jeff Goldblum)
description:
Chain Of Fools (2000- Elijah Wood, Steve Zahn, Jeff Goldblum, Tom Wilkinson)

IMDB- http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0194368/
IMDB Rating-6.1/10  (forget this dumb*** rating. It boggles my mind how this has gotten so low. Most of the people at IMDB must be retarded or something. This movie is an easy 8.0-8.5 Then again, I\&#039;m not surprised....after all, a movie like Knocked Up got a high rating and that was complete trash.)


\"\"Chain Of Fools\" is a heist comedy-romance about a haples barber (Steve Zahn) whose life takes a turn for the worse when he ends up in possession of a stolen treasure of ancient coins (the \"Shiny New Enemies\") and simultaneously falls on the wrong side of the law and in love with the detective (Salma Hayek) investigating the crime.\"



My favorite character: Mickey. A young teenage hitman.

My favorite line: \"You brought a sandwich to a heist.......?\"


I only have between 30 and 40 KBPS (give or take) so it may be a while before you get it. Also, sometimes my ISP (comcast) has this thing where my modem shuts off randomly for about an hour. If I am asleep, it may take an hour before it starts seeding again. If I am awake, I can just reset the modem and it will start seeding soon after.

I did a quick view of the movie in several places and the Video and Audio seem to be about perfect to watch.
